Authors and Citation

Authors

  • Georgi N. Boshnakov. Author, maintainer.
    R port, R code, new C code and modifications to bibutils' C code, conversion to Bibentry (R and C code)

  • Chris Putman. Author.
    src/*, author of the bibutils libraries, https://sourceforge.net/projects/bibutils/

  • Richard Mathar. Contributor.
    src/addsout.c

  • Johannes Wilm. Contributor.
    src/biblatexin.c, src/bltypes.c

  • R Core Team. Contributor.
    base R's bibentry and bibstyle implementation

Citation

Source: DESCRIPTION

Boshnakov GN, Putman C (2024). rbibutils: Read 'Bibtex' Files and Convert Between Bibliography Formats. R package version 2.2.16.9000, https://github.com/GeoBosh/rbibutils (devel), https://geobosh.github.io/rbibutils/ (doc).
